code: import{SOCKET_TYPES}from"../types/socketTypes";var socketReducer=function socketReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SOCKET_TYPES.SOCKET:return action.payload;default:return state;}};export default socketReducer;
